name: Flappy Moving Pipes
description:
The bird is back but this time with more challenge!

This time the pipes move up and down so the bird needs to dodge predict the slot and fly through it!

- Fly through the pipes to score high
- Some pipes move
- Avoid hitting the pipes
- Travel as far as you can
- Simple controls: Tap to flap n fly.

[Free version contains ads while playing, get the Pro version for no ads]
